display.title: The Fuel Injector
description: To kick start the Fusion Reactor, we'll need a quick shot of D-T fuel. This is made by combining &&cDeuterium&&r and &&eTritium&&r together in a Chemical Infuser.
Start by making a &&4Hohlraum&&r and place it into the Infuser (where the plus symbol is) to fill it with D-T fuel. Now we're ready to jumpstart the Reactor!
